turns.text: When crisis strikes and children are most vulnerable, we are always among the first to respond and the last to leave. We ensure children's unique needs are met and their voices are heard. We deliver lasting results for millions of children, including those hardest to reach. We do whatever it takes for children ¡ª transforming their lives and the future we share ¡ª because we believe every child deserves a future.
